name: Club Dread
tagline: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort -- a hedonistic island paradise for swingers --- it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence ... or at least hide it!

name: Let It Ride
tagline: A nosy cab driver gets a hot tip on a race horse and wins big, but he can't seem to stop gambling. Will he go broke or walk home with a pretty penny?

name: The Handmaid's Tale
tagline: In a dystopicly polluted rightwing religious tyranny, a young woman is put in sexual slavery on account of her now rare fertility.

name: Twenty Feet from Stardom
tagline: Backup singers live in a world that lies just beyond the spotlight. Their voices bring harmony to the biggest bands in popular music, but we've had no idea who these singers are or what lives they lead, until now.

name: Jean de Florette
tagline: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

name: The Apparition
tagline: A couple is haunted by a supernatural presence that is unleashed during a college experiment.

name: From Justin to Kelly
tagline: A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.

name: Birthday Girl
tagline: A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.

name: Leonard Part 6
tagline: A secret agent is called out of retirement to save the world from an evil genius.

name: The Lover
tagline: In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.

name: The Magdalene Sisters
tagline: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

name: Hamlet 2
tagline: In this irreverent comedy, a failed actor-turned-worse-high-school-drama-teacher rallies his Tucson, AZ students as he conceives and stages politically incorrect musical sequel to Shakespeare's Hamlet.

name: Hilary and Jackie
tagline: The tragic story of world renowned classic cellist Jacqueline du Pré, as told from the point of view of her sister, flautist Hilary du Pré-Finzi.

name: The Virgin Suicides
tagline: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents.

name: Paris, je t'aime
tagline: Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented and awakened.

name: Hollywood Ending
tagline: A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

name: Extreme Ops
tagline: While filming a advertisment, some extreme sports enthusiasts unwittingly stop a group of terrorists.

name: A Chorus Line
tagline: Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.

name: The Libertine
tagline: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.

name: Antonia's Line
tagline: A Dutch matron establishes and, for several generations, oversees a close-knit, matriarchal community where feminism and liberalism thrive.

name: Angus
tagline: A miserable fat teenager secretly has a crush on the class beauty, ends up becoming the surprising participant to dance with her at a high school dance, meaning he's got to get his act together with the help of his best friend.

name: Slackers
tagline: When geek Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the exam system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.

name: The Long Walk Home
tagline: Two women, black and white, in 1955 Montgomery Alabama, must decide what they are going to do in response to the famous bus boycott lead by Martin Luther King.

name: The Lonely Guy
tagline: A writer for a greeting card company learns the true meaning of loneliness when he comes home to find his girlfriend in bed with another man.

name: Into the West
tagline: Grandpa Ward gives a horse he found to his grandchildren, who keep it in their tower-block flat in Dublin. The horse is stolen from them, and the two young boys set out to find it and flee on it.

name: The Good Mother
tagline: A divorced mother may lose custody of her young daughter to her ex-husband after he learns that the little girl crawled into bed with the mother and her boyfriend.

name: Violets Are Blue...
tagline: Young love may endure in your heart and one day re-ignite, but reality may soon dowse the flames.

name: A Walk on the Moon
tagline: The world of a young housewife is turned upside down when she has an affair with a free-spirited blouse salesman.

name: Duets
tagline: A professional karaoke hustler reconnects with his daughter and a bored suburban businessman turns outlaw karaoke singer, among other plotlines.

name: Drugstore Cowboy
tagline: A realistic road movie about a drug addict, his 'family', and their inevitable decline into crime.

name: The Other Side of Heaven
tagline: John Groberg, a farm kid from Idaho Falls, crosses an ocean to become a missionary in the remote and exotic Tongan islands during the 1950's.

name: In the Cut
tagline: A New York writing professor, Frannie Avery (Ryan), has an erotic affair with a police detective (Ruffalo) investigating a murder in her neighborhood of a beautiful young woman...

name: King Kong Lives
tagline: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive!

name: Your Friends & Neighbors
tagline: Unhappy couples fall apart and hop into other beds with other people.

name: Howl's Moving Castle
tagline: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking home.

name: College
tagline: A wild weekend is in store for three high school seniors who visit a local college campus as prospective freshmen.

name: True Identity
tagline: In order to escape from the mob, an African-American man must disguise himself as a white man.

name: Igby Goes Down
tagline: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

name: Viva Las Vegas
tagline: Race car driver Lucky Jackson goes to Las Vegas to earn money to pay for a new engine for his motor car. Working as a waiter, he still finds the time to court young Rusty Martin.

name: This Is Spinal Tap
tagline: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DeBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

name: The Science of Sleep
tagline: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is lovestruck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

name: Evil Under the Sun
tagline: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

production.name: Twilight Motion Picture Seven Ltd. Partnership

name: Radio Flyer
tagline: A father recounts a dark period of his childhood when he and his little brother lived in the suburbs.

name: Geronimo
tagline: This story of epic courage and grace is a remarkable window on Native American life and the early years of the last and most feared Apache War Chief.

name: Grease 2
tagline: An English student at a 1960's American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

name: Fire with Fire
tagline: A young woman from a Catholic school and a young man from a nearby prison camp fall in love and must run away together to escape the law, the church and their parents.

name: Black Beauty
tagline: The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

name: Apocalypse Now
tagline: During the U.S.-Viet Nam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

name: Let's Go to Prison
tagline: When a career criminal's plan for revenge is thwarted by unlikely circumstances, he puts his intended victim's son in his place by putting him in prison...and then joining him.

name: Joe's Apartment
tagline: A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

name: Longtime Companion
tagline: The emergence and devastation of the AIDS epidemic is chronicled in the lives of several gay men living during the 1980s.

name: Dutch
tagline: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a man volunteers to pick him up from a prep school....only to learn that her son's not the nicest kid.

name: Lust, Caution
tagline: An espionage thriller set in WWII-era Shanghai, in which a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

production.name: Fonds de télévision et de câblodistribution pour la porduction d'émissions canadiennes

name: Eliminators
tagline: A former pilot rebels against his creator, teaming up with the scientist responsible for android technology, her pet robot Spot, a rough-and-tumble riverboat guide, and a martial arts warrior.

name: River's Edge
tagline: A high school slacker kills his girlfriend and shows off her dead body to his friends. However, the friends' reaction is almost as ambiguous and perplexing as the crime itself.

name: Thirteen
tagline: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.

name: Deception
tagline: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

name: Sunset
tagline: Tom Mix and Wyatt Earp team up to solve a murder at the Academy Awards in 1929 Hollywood.

name: The Lookout
tagline: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

name: Love in the Time of Cholera
tagline: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

name: Touching the Void
tagline: The true story of two climbers and their perilous journey up the west face of Siula Grande in the Peruvian Andes in 1985.

name: Made in Heaven
tagline: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a boy runs away to California. But he ends up in heaven because he dies after trying to help a family from drowning in a river. In heaven he'll meet a beautiful girl, who has never reincarnated before.

name: Atlas Shrugged: Part I
tagline: Railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.

name: Ong-bak
tagline: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.

name: The Mighty Quinn
tagline: When police officer Xavier Quinn's childhood friend, Maubee, becomes associated with murder and a briefcase full of ten thousand dollar bills, The Mighty Quinn must clear his name. Or try to catch him, which could be even trickier.

name: Mumford
tagline: In the small town of Mumford, a psychologist of the same name moves in and quickly becomes very popular, despite a questionable past.

name: Au Revoir Les Enfants
tagline: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. He becomes the roommate of top student in his class. Rivals at first, the roommates form a bond and share a secret.
